resources.string:
I\'m OK! notifies your friends and family in the event of an emergency. Visit our web site for more information:
http://imokapp.appspot.com
Your message will be forwarded to all of your contacts and services. If you selected the Person Finder service,it will be posted where anybody can see it.
IF YOU NEED IMMEDIATE HELP, YOU SHOULD CALL YOUR LOCAL EMERGENCY PHONE NUMBER, SUCH AS 911. MESSAGES SENT BY THIS APP MAY NOT REACH EMERGENCY RESPONDERS.

Your message will be forwarded to your emergency contacts and services. Emergency responders will also be allowed to read it. If you selected the Person Finder service, it will be posted where anybody can see it.
Message sent. The server will send a confirmation once it receives your message.
There was an error sending your message. Please try again.
You have already verified your phone number. Would you like to verify it again?
We are going to send an SMS to verify your phone number with the gateway. Is this OK?
Please login to the "I'm OK" website and check whether your phone number has been verified under your account.
There was an error sending the verification SMS. Please check the gateway number and try again.
Please go to http:/imok.jeztek.com and enter the user key provided:
